name: Pimentola
description: '''Pimentola''' (literally, "Region of Darkness") is an [[Electronic music|electronic]] [[orchestral]]/[[Industrial music|industrial]] project from [[Finland]]. Originally formed in 1996 by Lempo and Turja, it has since become the solo project of Lempo. Early dark/black metal influences have been dropped and experimental, industrial, neoclassical, orchestral, ethnic and tribal sounds have been added. In 2006 Pimentola was signed to the highly influential [[Sweden|Swedish]] label [[Cold Meat Industry]], which released the CD ''Misantropolis'' in 2007.
